response.job_title: Machine Learning/Data Engineering | AI and Games | Computer Vision
response.summary: I am a seasoned Senior Machine Learning Engineer with a passion for leveraging cutting-edge technologies to drive impactful solutions. With a track record spanning diverse industries, I have consistently delivered innovative results that enhance efficiency, user experience, and revenue growth.
response.skills: Supervised Learning, Computer Vision, Deep Learning, Big Data, Data Modeling, AI, Unreal Engine 4, Python (Programming Language), Python, Microservices, Full-Stack Development, Algoritmos, Machine Learning, Desarrollo de software, Metodologías ágiles, Programación orientada a objetos (POO), Arquitectura de software, Procesamiento de grandes volúmenes de datos, Minería de datos, Inteligencia artificial

profile_positions.description:
* Played a pivotal role in ML model training, monitoring, and validation, ensuring data reproducibility and model accuracy.
* Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to integrate machine learning solutions seamlessly into existing workflows.
* Successfully deployed deep learning-based facial recognition services impacting approximately 300k customers.
* Achieved a 15% acceleration in the decision-making process, providing a faster and more efficient experience for both customers and the bank.
* Implemented continuous monitoring mechanisms to ensure the reliability and security of the facial recognition system.
*Developed data pipelines (ETLs) and helped with ML model training, monitoring, validation and ensure the data reproducibility using Python and Scala for acquisition machine learning models
*Deploy Machine Learning based services for facial recognitions impacting directly about 300k customers and making decision process faster in about 15%
profile_positions.title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer

profile_positions.description:
* Utilized machine learning algorithms to identify optimal pricing strategies, ensuring a balance between revenue growth and customer satisfaction.
* Created feature engineering pipelines to transform features utilized across multiple machine learning , deep learning and data processing environments.
* Engineered machine learning and deep learning pipelines that contributed to a 3.8% improvement in open-rate for push notifications, resulting in a 20% uplift in channel health versus organic sales.
* Engineered ETL processes using Python to make data accessible for pricing AB tests, enabling comprehensive analysis of test results and business metrics.
* Successfully concluded AB tests, achieving a remarkable 5.6% uplift in overall revenue and a 15.3% uplift in product sales across multiple countries.
profile_positions.title: Machine Learning Engineer

profile_positions.description:
* Led the design and implementation of a scalable Big Data architecture, resulting in a 30% increase in processing efficiency.
* Optimized existing data pipelines through parallel processing and distributed computing, reducing latency by 20%.
* Collaborated with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions.
* Conducted regular performance assessments and fine-tuned algorithms to meet evolving business needs.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
* Developed and optimized AI systems, enhancing NPC behaviors and creating challenging, yet rewarding, in-game opponents.
* Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including artists and designers, to ensure seamless integration of gameplay elements with the overall game vision.
* Utilized Unreal Engine 4 to create dynamic and visually stunning environments, ensuring a high level of polish and player satisfaction.
* Actively participated in brainstorming sessions to conceptualize and prototype new game mechanics, fostering a culture of creativity and innovation within the development team.
profile_positions.title: Gameplay Developer

profile_positions.description:
* Founder of video games investigation group focused in mechanics, AI and production, looking for ways to improve AI perceptions and workflow in multi platform games. 
* Junior gameplay developer in charge of mechanics and AI for multi platform games.
* Gained hands-on experience in debugging and optimizing code for improved performance and responsiveness.
* Collaborated with senior developers to learn best practices in gameplay programming and AI development.
* Assisted in the integration of third-party plugins and tools to enhance development efficiency.
profile_positions.title: Junior Software Engineer

education.degree_name: Master of Applied Math And Computer Science

company.name: Nubank
company.description:
Nu was born in 2013 with the mission to fight complexity to empower people in their daily lives by reinventing financial services.

We are one of the world’s largest digital banking platforms, serving more than 80 million customers across Brazil, Mexico, and Colombia. 

As one of the leading technology companies in the world, Nu leverages proprietary technologies and innovative business practices to create new financial solutions and experiences for individuals and SMEs that are simple, intuitive, convenient, low-cost, empowering, and human. 

Guided by its mission, Nu is fostering access to financial services across Latin America.
